org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2

Class RestOAuth2AccessTokenValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.authz.modules.oauth2.RestOAuth2AccessTokenValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OAuth2AccessTokenValidator

    public class RestOAuth2AccessTokenValidator
extends Object
implements OAuth2AccessTokenValidator
    Access Token Validator for validating OAuth2 tokens issued by an OAuth2 Provider using REST requests.
    This validator requires the configuration given at construction to contain the following entries:
    • token-info-endpoint - the URI of OAuth2 Provider's tokeninfo endpoint (not including the access_token query parameter
    • user-info-endpoint - the URI of OAuth2 Provider's userinfo endpoint
    Since:
    1.4.0

      • validate

        public Promise<AccessTokenValidationResponse,OAuth2Exception> validate(String accessToken)
        Validates whether the given access token is valid, by referring to the OAuth2 Provider and gaining user profile information as well.
        Specified by:
        validate in interface OAuth2AccessTokenValidator
        Parameters:
        accessToken - The access token to validate.
        Returns:
        An AccessTokenValidationResponse containing the result of the validation and scope and profile information.
